lead_paragraph: COHEN--Barbara. Beloved wife of Arthur. Mother to David, Nancy, and Sandy. Mother-in-law to Rhonda and Mary. Devoted grandmother to Ben, Josh, Jacob and Nathaniel. Alumna of Hunter College. Long-time member and supporter of the Highland Park Conservative Temple - Anshe Emeth, the Jewish Federation, and the National Council of Jewish Women. Memorial contributions may be made to the Highland Park Conservative Temple - Anshe Emeth, the Jewish Federation in the Heart of New Jersey, or to the Jewish Community Center of LBI. 1/3
